description:
Finally a Dunkin Donuts app for Webos! 

Just open this elegant app and instantly it finds the closest 10 Dunkin Donuts locations within 7 miles around you. With one tap Double D's takes advantage of the multitasking abilities of Webos by opening both the phone & navigation apps instantly, giving you turn by turn directions and the ability to call the store with questions. 

Double D's also refreshes its list of Dunkin Donut locations closest to you periodically, which makes it great while driving for a hands-free experience.

Simply keep Double D's open in the background and always have your Dunkins fix just a tap away!

Works in all Webos versions including 2.0!
